body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, 4K Full HD Dash Camera for Cars, Free 64GB Card, ADDPET Car Camera Mini Dashcams with App, 3.5" Dash Camera, Built-in Wi-Fi, Wide Angle, WDR, 24H Parking Mode, Night Vision
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: 【ADDPET 4K Professional Dash Cam】 Your go-to for on-the-road security. Featuring a 4K front camera and 1080P rear camera, you can capture key details like road signs and license plates. With its 170-degree front and 140-degree rear wide angles, it reduces blind spots, providing coverage in unexpected situations such as collisions. Ideal for cars, SUVs, and jeeps, this dash cam front and rear ensures reliable performance across different vehicle types.

【Superior Vision Dash Camera】 Experience exceptional night vision with our real WDR/HDR image optimization technology and an ultra-large F1.8 aperture 7-glass lens. Capture crucial details vividly even in low-light conditions, minimizing disputes. The included free 64GB card ensures ample daily file storage for your dash camera.

【Built-in Wi-Fi and Smart App Control】 Simply connect the dash camera for cars to your smartphone via Wi-Fi and use the "Viidure" app to view, playback, and manage the dash cam on your iOS or Android devices. Edit and download videos directly within the app. With just one click, effortlessly share your travel scenery and memorable moments with friends and family.

【Compact and Super Easy to Install】 Experience the convenience of a compact, sleek, and powerful dash camera with a 3.5-inch display that won't impede your vision while driving. Packed with features like loop recording, WDR, G-sensor functionality, GPS, and a Type-C port, this dash cam front and rear supports up to a 128GB SD card. Mounting to your car's windshield is a breeze with the provided suction cup and holder, allowing you to plug it in and hit the road in no time.

【24-Hour Parking Monitoring】 This car camera recorder automatically activates and locks the current video in the event of a collision while parked, preserving crucial evidence. When installed with the hardwire kit, the dashcam front and rear camera provides 24/7 monitoring for your vehicle. With this setup, accident scenes can be accurately reconstructed, offering you peace of mind. Please note that a hardware kit is required to enable this feature.

【Reliable After-sales Service】 Contact our customer service via email, and we'll address any questions or concerns you may have regarding our 4K dash camera front and rear. Our team of experienced engineers and professional support staff is dedicated to providing comprehensive assistance 24/7 for every customer in need of guidance on the Car Camera Driving Recorder.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your Reliable Partner On the Road

4K+UHD DASH CAMERA Record the road and license plates in clear 4K+UHD video, offering excellent image quality for detailed playback and the ultimate visual experience. Loop Recording In loop recording, the dash cam captures video in 1/3/5 minute segments. When the Micro SD card is full, loop recording automatically overwrites the earliest files, excluding locked videos. Emergency Lock ADDPET car dash camera with adjustable G-Sensor and advanced lenses swiftly captures emergencies, automatically locks and saves footage in the emergency folder to prevent overwriting.

APP Control Built-in WiFi for easy video access via the App (available on IOS/Android), offering a convenient way to view, download, and share footage. Reviewing the product guides before use will greatly assist in setup. Parking Monitor Parking surveillance mode automatically records protected video upon collision detection. For 24-hour parking recording, use the voltage drop cable with a hardwire kit to power the car recorder in normal mode. (Hardwire kit required) 310° Wide Angle Featuring a 170° front camera and a 140° rear camera, this dash cam allows for simultaneous monitoring of the vehicle's front and rear, maximizing road coverage. It significantly improves night vision and delivers clear, crisp images and videos.

Glued + sliding slot design makes it easy to retrieve by sliding. No need to worry about the risk of falling suction cups. The upper and lower angles can be adjusted up to 170 degrees, while the left and right angles can be adjusted up to 360 degrees. Installation is both easy and quick.

ADDPET K9 4K Dash Cam Front and Rear REDTIGER Dash Cam Front Rear ROVE R2-4K Dash Cam ADDPET Metal 2K Dash Cam Front and Rear OMBAR Dash Cam Front and Rear Highest Resolution 4K 4K 4K 2K 4K Included Memory Card 64GB 32GB X 64GB 64GB Screen Size 3.5" 3.16" 2.4" 3" X 24H Parking Mode ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Night Vision ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ G-Sensor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Loop Recording ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wide Angle Both front and rear Both front and rear Only front Both front and rear Both front and rear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: **Key Features:**- **High-Quality Resolution:** The ADDPET Dash Cam boasts a 4K front camera and a 1080P rear camera, ensuring that every detail on the road is captured with clarity. The wide angles (170-degree front and 140-degree rear) significantly reduce blind spots, providing extensive coverage, especially in unexpected situations like collisions.- **Superior Vision Technology:** The dash cam excels in night vision with its real WDR/HDR image optimization technology and an ultra-large F1.8 aperture 7-glass lens. This ensures vivid capture of crucial details even in low-light conditions, minimizing disputes. The included free 64GB card provides ample daily file storage.- **Built-in Wi-Fi and Smart App Control:** Connecting the dash camera to your smartphone via Wi-Fi and using the "Viidure" app enhances user convenience. The app allows you to view, playback, and manage dash cam files directly on your iOS or Android devices. You can edit and download videos within the app and easily share your travel moments.- **Compact and Easy to Install:** The dash cam's compact design with a 3.5-inch display ensures it doesn't impede your vision while driving. Features like loop recording, G-sensor functionality, GPS, and a Type-C port, coupled with easy installation using the provided suction cup and holder, make it a user-friendly device.- **24-Hour Parking Monitoring:** The dash cam automatically activates and locks the current video in the event of a collision while parked, preserving crucial evidence. When paired with the hardwire kit, the 24/7 monitoring capability offers peace of mind, and accident scenes can be accurately reconstructed.- **Reliable After-sales Service:** ADDPET emphasizes reliable after-sales service, with a dedicated customer service team available via email 24/7. This commitment ensures that any questions or concerns regarding the dash cam are promptly addressed.**User Experience:**“My experience with the ADDPET 4K Professional Dash Cam has been overwhelmingly positive. The high-quality resolution, advanced vision technology, and user-friendly features make it a valuable addition to my vehicle. The app control and easy installation add to the overall convenience.”**Conclusion:**For those seeking a professional-grade dash cam with 4K resolution, comprehensive vision technology, and user-friendly features, the ADDPET Dash Cam is an excellent choice. A great dashcam. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Car dashcam with WiFi
reviews.reviewText: I've had several car dashcams over the years and I was interested to see how this one would perform. First off, this dashcam like most others have a fish-eye effect. Similar to other dashcams, navigating the menu options are awkward. It takes a while to get used to the men controls to customize your dash cam.The suction cup mechanism is about as good as my previous one so far.The color of the videos it records isn't as vibrant as my preferred dashcam. I don't like that the files are saved with a weird file extension. It confused me because I was expecting a MP4 file extension. However, I am happy to report that H.264 video settings plays fine.I played with the WiFi feature and I was able to get it to connect and work during testing. However, I still find myself preferring to pull the MicroSD card out directly and then insert it into an SD card adaptor to access the files. The reason why is it is still a hassle to try to get your phone to connect to Wifi to get the files.In any case, I tend to prefer to download videos directly to my computer because that is where I do the most of my video work.I have not yet tested the rear camera capabilities mainly because I don't want to bother running the wire to the rear windshield. I feel I have enough cables in my car as it is and I'm not yet motivated to record the rear view.Overall, the camera is okay. It works but I really look for vibrant colors and minimized fish-eye effect where I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🚗 ADDPET 4K Full HD Dash Cam - Your Trusty On-the-Road Companion! 📸
reviews.reviewText: The ADDPET 4K Full HD Dash Cam has seamlessly integrated into my driving experience, earning a well-deserved 5-star rating for its reliable performance, ease of use, and innovative features. Here's why it stands out:This front and rear dash cam, complete with a free 64GB card, offers crystal-clear 4K Full HD footage, providing peace of mind and enhanced safety on the road. The seamless connection and functionality once installed make it a trustworthy companion during your journeys.The ease of installation is a notable feature, ensuring that users can set up the dash cam without unnecessary complications. The user-friendly design caters to both novice and experienced users, contributing to a hassle-free experience from the get-go.The integration with a dedicated app adds a modern touch to the dash cam experience. The ability to monitor and control the dash cam from your phone enhances convenience, giving you easy access to footage and settings while on the go.The 3.5" dash camera comes equipped with built-in Wi-Fi, wide-angle lens, WDR (Wide Dynamic Range), 24H Parking Mode, and night vision capabilities. These features collectively contribute to a comprehensive and reliable recording system that captures crucial details in various driving conditions.Overall, the ADDPET 4K Full HD Dash Cam is a 5-star choice for anyone seeking a reliable, easy-to-use, and feature-rich dash camera for their car. Its innovative technology, seamless connectivity, and user-friendly interface make it a standout addition to enhance safety and security on the road. 🚗📸
